activities: Janssen Scientific Affairs, LLC processes employee personal information through its access to the J&J global corporate HR system inventory that contains employee data from the EU/EEA and Switzerland which is housed in the United States. The global corporate system inventory is used by J&J operating companies within the corporation to carry out Human Resource functions.  Additionally, Janssen Scientific Affairs, LLC receives personal information about investigators, research subjects, service providers, business partners, health care professionals, suppliers, and industry experts from JRD LLCs global clinical research operations in support of Janssen Scientific Affairs, LLC sponsored trials.
corpofftitle1: Company Group Chairman, North America Pharmaceuticals
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities (EU DPAs) Panel and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
